description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Pro Patria. A small sketch on a vast subject [i.e. the annexation of Alsace and Lorraine to Germany] ... Illustrated by Alfred Touchemolin" Author: DELAIRE, Jean. Contributor: TOUCHEMOLIN, Alfred. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012625.l.11." Page: 28 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Digby, Long & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000897080 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
